name: PARA MEDICAL EDUCATIONAL TRUST
briefDescription: The organization Paramedical Educational Trust (PET) started with five service minded members in 1994 with the main aim of establishing job opportunities for poor adolescents to reduce poverty among rural population in South India. After few years we expanded our field of work according to the needs of the community. Our objectives reach from women empowerment, support of people living on the edge of society, the spread of education and awareness to HIV/AIDS programmes and improvement of the local health situation.
